Description: Animal figure made of a brown Nile clay with inclusions of mica. Small cracks on the surface. Only the front part of the long head is preserved with a small slightly opened mouth, two incised holes as nose on top and two incised oval eyes. Part of a sheep? The area where the head is broken off shows a 1.3 cm long impression of what was probably a stick of some sort to attach another object (a crown?) to the head.
